name: Whirled
tagline: We put the rad in non-traditional.
description:
Whirled is a content agency based in Los Angeles. We make memorable video content that creates emotional connections between brands and people. Lots of people. In the past 8 years, our work for clients such as Google, YouTube, The Smithsonian, Lady Gaga & The White House have garnered over 1 Billion views.Â 
Our clients partner with us to navigate the right types of content that will work for them from format to story line and creation.
